text: The JAC Refine M2 is a compact Minivan made by JAC Motors from 2011 to 2018. == History and Features == The JAC Refine M2 was revealed in 2011. it was previously called JAC Heyue RS since it was from the Heyue series later it was renamed to JAC Refine M2 and was moved to the JAC Refine series the minivan has a 1.5 and 1.8 liter petrol engines with a 5-speed manual transmission and a 4-speed automatic transmission it was improved in 2012. == Markets == The JAC Refine M2 was sold mainly in the Chinese market but in some places outside China like Brazil it was sold as the JAC J6. == Discontinuation == The production of The JAC Refine M2 ended in 2018 and was discontinued without a sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: JAC Refine M2
